channel.title: CVE Feed for The Moodle Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Moodle Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-1692|2024-08-04T06:46:30.166Z -- the%20moodle%20project -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before version 3.7.2 is vulnerable to information exposure of service tokens for users enrolled in the same course.

item.title: CVE-2019-10187|2024-08-04T22:17:18.420Z -- the%20moodle%20project -- moodle
item.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. Users with permission to delete entries from a glossary were able to delete entries from other glossaries they did not have direct access to.

item.title: CVE-2019-10186|2024-08-04T22:10:10.036Z -- the%20moodle%20project -- moodle
item.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. A sesskey (CSRF) token was not being utilised by the XML loading/unloading admin tool.

item.title: CVE-2019-10189|2024-08-04T22:17:18.440Z -- the%20moodle%20project -- moodle
item.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. Teachers in an assignment group could modify group overrides for other groups in the same assignment.

item.title: CVE-2019-10188|2024-08-04T22:17:18.952Z -- the%20moodle%20project -- moodle
item.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. Teachers in a quiz group could modify group overrides for other groups in the same quiz.
